Section 8  (1)  of  the  Assistance 
to  and  Protection 
to  victims  of
crime  and  witnesses  Act  states  as follows;
"Any  person  who (a)  threatens  a  victim  of  cnme  or  a  witness

with 
injury 
to  his  person, 
reputation  or  property  or 
to 
the

person 
or  reputation 
or  property 
of  any  other 
in  whom  of

such 
victim 
of  crime  or  witness 
has  an 
interest,  with 
the

intention 
of  causing  alarm  to  such  victim  of  crime  or  witness 
to  refrain  from 
lodging  a  complaint  against  such  person  with

a 
law  enforcement  authority  or 
testifying  at  any  judicial  or

quasi -
